page.title: 19A day in JH Ampleforth Coll.
page.content: At 7:30 we are woken in our dormitories by a monitor ringing a handbell. Some may already be up, especially those in Extra Work. After washing and dressing we have Mass at 7:40 or prayers at 7:50. Breakfast at 8:00 is followed by bed inspections. From 8:45 to 11:00 there are three 45 minute periods, followed by a break until 11:30. Two more lessons follow until lunch. Lunch prep is from 1:30-2:00. Every afternoon there are games, such as Rugby or Cricket. Tea is at 4:00 which includes cakes on alternate days. Lessons restart at 4:30, a 10 minute break at 5:45 followed by the final lesson. At 6:30 we have prep followed by optional Mass. Supper is from 7:30 followed by valued free time before bed and prayers at 9:00. Lights out are at 9:45.
